text: Basdeo Panday (May 25, 1933 â€“ January 1, 2024) was a Trinidadian politician. He was the fifth Prime Minister of Trinidad and Tobago. He served as Prime Minister from 1995 to 2001. Panday died on January 1, 2024 at a hospital in Jacksonville, Florida from pneumonia at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Trinidad and Tobago Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Basdeo Panday
